items.sentence: Tom isn't the only one in our office who speaks French.
I don't think that Tom knows who gave me this umbrella.
I could've helped if you'd let me know you needed help.
I still haven't figured out what's causing the problem.
Tom just stood there, wondering what might happen next.
Tom waited patiently for three hours, and then gave up.
Grandpa fell down the stairs and was seriously injured.
The bus came to a stop, and all the passengers got off.
Tom told me that he thought it would be fun to do that.
Tom told me that he thought he had a chance of winning.
